suggest.amasty/module-advanced-review-purchased: This package provides the possibility to limit reviews only for customers who bought the product.
suggest.amasty/module-advanced-review-api: Install this package for REST API compatibility.
suggest.amasty/module-invisible-captcha-subscrip: Install this package for compatibility with captcha subscription features.
suggest.amasty/module-advanced-review-hyva: Install module-advanced-review-hyva module to activate the integration with Hyva Theme.
